rationale: Includes 40 mg once-daily, empty-stomach, morning dosing and “do not split” instruction, but omits Walgreens Speedway same-day pickup detail.
Lists atorvastatin 20 mg with supper correctly, but fails to mention aspirin 81 mg with breakfast.
Does not introduce unmentioned drugs or conflicting doses; atorvastatin dose matches transcript.
No mention of QT 462 ms, ‘borderline’ comment, decision, or fax plan.
Provides instruction to log dizzy spells/palpitations/calf cramps, but does not record the patient’s reported dizziness episode itself.
Explicitly warns to avoid grapefruit and St. John’s wort.
Captures tablet-splitting question but omits medication supply delay details.
Note covers several key points but misses ECG/QT plan, aspirin, and supply issue; some content present but not fully comprehensive.
No fabricated diagnoses or additional clinical reasoning observed.
